name: usercrud
description: The userCrud functionality enables Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) operations for managing user data in a web application. Implemented with Node.js, Express, and Prisma with PostgreSQL, it provides endpoints (POST /users, GET /users, PUT /users/:id, DELETE /users/:id) to create new users, fetch user details, update existing users, and delete users based on their unique identifiers. This setup ensures efficient, type-safe database interactions, enhancing application scalability and maintenance.
author: Muhammad Atif
